entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 3.
